vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.47
§ Jasiel or Jaasiel = "God is maker"
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a son of Abner and a chief of Benjamin
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   hijo de Abner; jefe; tribu de Benjamín; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅西業 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "神是創造者"
1) 一位大衛的大能勇士 (代上 11:47)
2) 押尼珥的兒子, 便雅憫人的首領(代上 27:21)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅西业 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "神是创造者"
1) 一位大卫的大能勇士 (代上 11:47)
2) 押尼珥的儿子, 便雅悯人的首领(代上 27:21)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.21;
son of: Abner (H0074)
§ Jasiel or Jaasiel = "God is maker"
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a son of Abner and a chief of Benjamin
